imdb.plot outline: It's the weekend, and you know you're itching to escape. We have the perfect destination and route that will take you into a much needed getaway to recharge, relax and refresh yourself. Every Friday you can take your loved ones along for the ride too.
imdb.title: The Getaway
plot: It's the weekend, and you know you're itching to escape. We have the perfect destination and route that will take you into a much needed getaway to recharge, relax and refresh yourself. Every Friday you can take your loved ones along for the ride too.
